mapper.select: SELECT m.sn, c.project, c.category, c.type, c.imageUrl, c.videoUrl, ctSource, c.title From tbl_contents c inner join tbl_mapping_contents m on c.sn = m.contentsSn where m.sn=#{sn}
SELECT sn, project, category, type, imageUrl, videoUrl, ctSource, title, regDate from tbl_contents where sn=#{sn}
SELECT sn, title, projectcd, comment, state, logoimg, basictitle, regUser, mngUser, regDate from tbl_project where sn=#{sn}
SELECT sn,title,bannerImg,iconImg ,adinfo ,adtime ,adTag ,regDate, pCate, depth, projectSn from tbl_category where sn=#{sn}
SELECT sn,title,bannerImg ,iconImg ,adinfo ,adtime as 'adNum', adTag ,regDate, pCate, depth, projectSn from tbl_category where projectSn=#{sn} and depth=1 order by sort asc
SELECT sn,title,bannerImg,iconImg ,adinfo ,adtime as 'adNum',adTag ,regDate, pCate, depth, projectSn from tbl_category where projectSn=#{projectSn} and pCate =#{pCate} and depth=2 order by sort asc
SELECT sn as category01,title from tbl_category where projectSn=#{sn} and depth=1 order by sort asc
SELECT sn as category02 ,title from tbl_category where pCate =#{sn} and depth=2 order by sort asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_project (title, projectcd, comment, state, logoimg, basicTitle, regUser, mngUser ) values ( #{title}, #{projectcd}, #{comment} , #{state},#{logoimg},#{basicTitle},#{userid},#{mnguser} )

insert into tbl_contents (project, category01, category02, type, imageUrl, videoUrl, ctSource, title, state ) values ( #{project}, #{category01}, #{category02}, #{type} , #{imageUrl},#{videoUrl},#{ctSource},#{title},#{state} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tbl_mapping_contents (projectSn, category01, category02, contentsSn ) values ( #{project}, #{category01}, #{category02},#{sn});
mapper.sql:
WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.state = '100' AND keyword LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTitle}, '%') AND m.projectSn = #{sproject} AND type = #{stype} AND m.regDate between date(#{startDate}) and date(#{endDate})+1 AND m.category01 = #{category01} AND m.category02 = #{category02}
ORDER BY m.regDate Desc
ORDER BY m.regDate Asc
ORDER BY c.title Desc
ORDER BY c.title Asc
ORDER BY c.keyword Desc
ORDER BY c.keyword Asc
ORDER BY m.sn Desc

WHERE 1 = 1 AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTitle}, '%')
AND c.state = #{state}
ORDER BY ct desc
ORDER BY ct asc
ORDER BY sn desc
mapper.select:
SELECT m.sn, m.projectSn, (select title from tbl_project where sn = m.projectSn) projectTitle, (select title from tbl_category where sn = m.category01) as 'category01Title', (select title from tbl_category where sn = m.category02) as 'category02Title', m.like, (select title from tcode where code1='TYPE' and code2=c.type) as 'type', imageUrl, videoUrl, (select title from tcode where code1='CONT' and code2=c.ctSource) as 'ctSource', c.title, c.keyword, m.regDate, c.userid, (select count(*) from tbl_msg where contentSn = m.sn) as msgCt, m.suggest From tbl_contents c inner join tbl_mapping_contents m on c.sn = m.contentsSn LEFT JOIN tbl_project p on m.projectSn = p.sn
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, #{pageNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_contents c inner join tbl_mapping_contents m on c.sn = m.contentsSn LEFT JOIN tbl_project p on m.projectSn = p.sn

SELECT c.sn, m.projectSn, m.like, c.msg, c.regDate, c.regId From tbl_msg c inner join tbl_mapping_contents m on c.contentSn = m.sn
ORDER BY c.sn desc
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_msg c inner join tbl_mapping_contents m on c.contentSn = m.sn
